title: 98/188/EC: Commission Decision of 2 March 1998 amending Council Decision 97/602/EC concerning the list referred to in the second subparagraph of Article 3(1) of Regulation (EEC) No 3254/91 and in Article 1(1)(a) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 35/97
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 2 March 1998 amending Council Decision 97/602/EC concerning the list referred to in the second subparagraph of Article 3(1) of Regulation (EEC) No 3254/91 and in Article 1(1)(a) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 35/97 (98/188/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 97/602/EC shall be replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision shall enter into force on 1 December 1997.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 March 1998.
For the Commission
Ritt BJERREGAARD
Member of the Commission
